bibl.title: Note on the Beatty-Michigan Pauline Papyrus.
bibl.note: P. Chester Beatty II supplement (= van Haelst 497). Brief account of the acquisition of P 46, and a table which gives an excellent idea of the original state of the manuscript.
bibl.seg: Clark Kenneth W., Note on the Beatty-Michigan Pauline Papyrus.
P. Chester Beatty II supplement (= van Haelst 497). Brief account of the acquisition of P 46, and a table which gives an excellent idea of the original state of the manuscript.
